item.title: Largest federal workers union calls for ‘clean’ bill to end shutdown
item.description: The American Federation of Government Employees is calling for a stopgap funding measure to bring employees back to work with back pay.

item.title: What’s Obama been up to?
item.description: Why Democrats are looking to a former president to weather the Trump storm.

item.title: Trump called Pence a ‘wimp’ before Jan. 6 attack, according to new notes

item.title: Virginia Democrats kick off effort to create more blue congressional seats
item.description: A special session of the Virginia General Assembly starts Monday. It’s part of a nationwide redistricting race, with Indiana’s Republican governor cal...

item.title: Americans split along political lines over Bad Bunny’s Super Bowl pick
item.description: A Quinnipiac University poll shows Democrats overwhelmingly support the NFL’s pick for the halftime show while nearly as many Republicans oppose it.
